name: ark-asa-backup-web
description: ARK: Survival Ascended Backup Manager - Monorepo Root

scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.clean: npm run clean:client && npm run clean:server
scripts.lint:client: cd client && npm run format:check && npx tsc --noEmit
scripts.lint:server: cd server && npm run format:check && npx tsc --noEmit
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:client && npm run lint:server
scripts.format:all: npm run format:client && npm run format:server
